name: magicwand-shared

scripts.release: git stash -u && npm run build && git stash pop && git add -A && git commit -m "$npm_config_message" && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags

description: After making changes run: npm run release --message='Your commit message'
